tool_description: An API showing all the latest New World News from multiple gaming websites.
name: New World News
title: New World News

api_list.name: Get News From Individual Source
api_list.description: Retrieves news links and titles from individual source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://new-world-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/ign"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "new-world-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://new-world-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "new-world-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All New World News From All Sources
api_list.description: Retrieves news links and titles from multiple sources.
